scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:frontend" "npm run dev:cv-mock"
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn main:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 8000
scripts.dev:cv-mock: cd services/cv-mock && source venv/bin/activate && python -m uvicorn app:app --reload --host 0.0.0.0 --port 9000
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:worker
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../cloudflare-worker && npm install
scripts.lint: npm run lint:frontend && npm run lint:worker
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run setup:env
scripts.setup:env: cp env.example .env && cp frontend/env.example frontend/.env && cp backend/env.example backend/.env
